TopicTitle: The Kraken has eaten the universe.

Articles.Content:
What happened:

Me: Ah, what a nice day! I'll launch my Jool explorer today. Woohoo!

Me: Okay, ascent is nominal...

Me:turning to 45 degr-HOLY MOTHER OF DANNY WHAT THE F*** IS HAPPENING

Yep. Seen before in a few videos. Never thought the kraken would strike me.

Oh, and later, i thought it had something to do with the launch vehicle's part clipping, so i just hyperedited the probe into orbit.

I plotted the manuever node and-

Again? Come on, kraken!

EDIT: I uninstalled some memory-hogging mods like kerbinside, and there were no more Kraken-attacks. I guess it had to do with me penetrating the memory limit.

I am also thinking about deleting Dres. Or Eeloo. Really, i find Dres more interesting, though I've never been there.

Edited April 10, 2015 by Rolanvorxariat
